title: CITS American Express Business Travel Wins The 2015 Corporate Travel Management Company Of The Year Award, From TravelWeekly China
text: Best High-Yielders CITS American Express Business Travel Wins The 2015 Corporate Travel Management Company Of The Year Award, From TravelWeekly China By PR Newswire | 08/05/15 - 12:17 AM EDT Reprint SHANGHAI , Aug. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CITS American Express Business Travel announced today it has been awarded the " 2015 Corporate Travel Management Company of the Year " award at TravelWeekly China's " 2015 China Travel and Meetings Industry Awards " . This is the fifth consecutive year CITS American Express Business Travel has received this award. The award was presented yesterday in a ceremony at the W Beijing Hotel Chang'an in Beijing. Marco Pellizzer , Vice President, China and Hong Kong , American Express Global Business Travel, said: "Once again, we are enormously grateful to TravelWeekly China for this award and everyone who voted for CITS American Express Business Travel. It is an honor to receive this award for the fifth year in a row, and see our continued efforts recognized by our industry and of course business travelers. "Our focus at CITS American Express Business Travel has always been to help our customers to drive improvements in their travel programs, and to advance the business travel sector overall in China through technology, local expertise and global best practice. We are very proud of the contributions we have made thus far to advancing corporate travel in China and look forward to growing and evolving in this rapidly changing environment."By combining the global expertise of American Express Global Business Travel - currently celebrating 100 years of American Express powering business through travel - and the local insight of China International Travel Service (CITS) in one joint venture, CITS American Express Business Travel is in a unique position to provide customers with global best practice and local insight. 1 of 3
